are.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn4@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-50-00-743_e728918eb9dbc395.webp","https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/5848cf64-d1ce-4245-8440-eaffd08f875a.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn82@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-50-02-931_8e001b67847429c1.webp","https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/87b42577-61b9-424e-abed-fb0a03adb447.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn67@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-59-353_bf5d05ca29e047fc.webp","https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&k=14&r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Fquote-maker-apps-instagram&bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&bvt=rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn10@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-53-414_115dad57c2a0fe07.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425370073},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:30","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:30","title":"10 Best Video Editing Software Tools for YouTube","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/youtube-video-editor-alternatives","description":"<p>People&nbsp;watch almost&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.businessofapps.com/data/youtube-statistics/\">5 billion videos</a>&nbsp;every day on YouTube. It’s no wonder content&nbsp;creators choose this channel to share their ideas, products, and skills — they know there’s potential to earn a great following and potential customers. Given the multitude of videos that live on the platform, it’s important to make yours stand out if you want the same.</p> \n<p>The quality of your video will rely on your filming equipment and the editing software you use. A video with high resolution, proper lighting, and seamless video editing will set the foundation for masterful and professional-looking content.</p> \n<p>To help you accomplish this, we’ve created a list that features the best (free and paid) video editing tools on the market. All of these tools make it possible for you to create engaging, standout content for the <a href=\"https://www.statista.com/statistics/910875/us-most-popular-video-streaming-services-by-monthly-average-users/#:~:text=The%20most%20popular%20video%20streaming,with%20just%20under%2026.5%20million.\">world’s most popular streaming service</a>.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=b33cfd44-133a-49e3-a943-086c5679d485&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; margin: 0 auto; display: block; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px\" alt=\"→ Free Templates: How to Use YouTube for Business [Download Now]\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/b33cfd44-133a-49e3-a943-086c5679d485.png\" align=\"middle\"></a></p> \n<p></p> \n<h3>1.<a href=\"https://shotcut.org/\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://shotcut.org/\">Shotcut</a></h3> \n<p>Shotcut, a free open source video editor that is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux, offers a variety of impressive features comparable to Windows Movie Maker. For instance, the tool allows you to cut video footage to a certain length before converting it, and offers filters and effects to make your video look sleeker. Shotcut can handle streaming in a variety of formats, ranging from HTTP to RTSP and UDP.</p> \n<p>While the interface is minimalist, the tool is actually very comprehensive, and all of its video and audio filters are fully customizable. Best of all, you can add, remove, or alter your changes at any time, since editing on Shotcut is non-linear; or able to be edited out of chronological order.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"Shotcut video editing software mask file\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-Mar-12-2021-06-08-24-43-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-Mar-12-2021-06-08-24-43-PM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://shotcut.org/blog/\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;Free</p> \n<p><strong>Available for:</strong>&nbsp;Windows, Mac, and Linux</p> \n<h3>2.<a href=\"http://www.videosoftdev.com/free-video-editor\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"http://www.videosoftdev.com/free-video-editor\">VSDC Free Video Editor</a></h3> \n<p>VSDC allows you to either import existing clips or record directly from your webcam, making it an excellent option for YouTube vloggers. The interface is simple, and the tool provides options to apply \"Instagram-like filters\", voiceovers, titles, shapes, and other impressive visual and audio effects. Additionally, VSDC lets you export straight to YouTube or another social network.</p> \n<p>It's important to note, if you want to export your videos from the free version, you'll select the cog icon in the top right, click \"Acceleration options\" and then uncheck the box marked, \"Use hardware acceleration for encoding video\".</p> \n<p><img alt=\"VSDA video editing software used on recording\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-2.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-2.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://www.videosoftdev.com/free-video-editor\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price: </strong>Free, or $19.99 for Pro Version</p> \n<p><strong>Available for: </strong>Windows</p> \n<h3>3.<a href=\"https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/davinciresolve/\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/davinciresolve/\">DaVinci Resolve 15</a></h3> \n<p>Matti Haapoja, a YouTuber with a channel that focuses on the filmmaking process, reviewed this tool and <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbvIIQc5Jo9-jIXnkPe03oA/\">c</a><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbvIIQc5Jo9-jIXnkPe03oA/\">ompared it in quality</a>&nbsp;to Final Cut Pro and Premiere Pro (unlike those programs, DaVinci Resolve 15 is completely free). DaVinci Resolve 15 provides tools for both offline and online editing, color correction, post-production audio effects, and visual effects. Additionally, the software lets you collaborate with others during the editing process, which could be particularly helpful if you have multiple video editors on your team.</p> \n<p>Best of all, DaVinci Resolve 15 offers impressive features to help your video rank for SEO — for instance, you can use Smart Bins to automatically sort and display footage based on metadata criteria (you can also sort manually). Additionally, you're able to enter custom keywords and tags.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"DaVinci video editing software used on film scenes\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-3.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-3.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/davinciresolve/\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;Free for DaVinci Resolve 15, or $299 for DaVinci Resolve 15 Studio</p> \n<p><strong>Available for: </strong>Windows, Linux, Mac</p> \n<h3>4.<a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.lwks.com/\">LightWorks</a></h3> \n<p>If you’re looking for an extensively customizable, professional software, then look no further than LightWorks. While it’s available for free trial, investing in this software will offer a much more extensive user experience. LightWorks offers media production features that you can use to edit film nonlinearly, with over 100 special effects. Not only that, it has support for up to 4K resolution and is compatible with both HD and SD formats. Users can also enjoy a range of royalty-free audio and video content suitable for YouTube’s copyright guidelines. The software features new social media templates for smooth transitions, thumbnails, and more that can prove beneficial for uploading to many different channels.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"LightWorks video editing software showing layered audio files\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube.jpeg?width=598&amp;height=398&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"598\" height=\"398\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://trainingfinalcut.com/tag/lightworks/\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;Free, $24.99 monthly or $174.99 annually for full access</p> \n<p><strong>Available for: </strong>Mac, Linux, Windows</p> \n<h3>5.<a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.magisto.com/\">Magisto</a></h3> \n<p>Magisto is a software that simplifies video editing for those intimidated by more technical processes. Designed for novice and beginner video editors, this interface uses AI to create video content in minutes. Users only have to upload footage and audio files and the&nbsp;software does most of the work&nbsp;based upon the style of video requested. Editors can use its professional auto-editing abilities that include facial recognition, filters, and more on&nbsp;a PC or smartphone. Magisto’s easy-to-use streamlined process is an efficient way to create videos for business at scale on iOS and Android devices.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Magisto video editing software landing page\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-1.jpeg?width=598&amp;height=398&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-1.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"598\" height=\"398\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.magisto.com/create-videos-in-minutes?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=ppc&amp;utm_campaign=Brand&amp;utm_term=magisto&amp;matchtype=e&amp;distribution=search&amp;ad_id=341702120768&amp;placement=&amp;adgroup=Brand_1_exact&amp;gclid=EAIaIQobChMIkqiV7ZqS7wIVUvDACh2U9wS4EAAYASAAEgK9ofD_BwE\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;Free for basic plan, $4.99 to $34.99 monthly</p> \n<p><strong>Available for: </strong>iOS, Android</p> \n<p></p> \n<h3>1.<a href=\"https://filmora.wondershare.com/video-editor/\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://filmora.wondershare.com/video-editor/\">Wondershare Filmora9</a></h3> \n<p>Referred to as \"a video editor for all creators\", this tool is incredibly easy to use whether you're a novice video editor or a professional. With Filmora9, you're able to use filters, overlays, transitions, and custom titles to spruce up your content for YouTube and engage your audience.</p> \n<p>Additionally, the tool offers audio features for key-framing and background noise removal, as well as an audio equalizer. If you have multiple clips you're hoping to combine into one cohesive video, this is a good tool for you — it allows you to import up to 100 layers of media and offers features so you can layer your clips.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Wondershare Filamore9 green screen before and after shot\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-1.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-1.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://filmora.wondershare.com/video-editor/\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price: </strong>Free trial, $59.99 one-time fee or $44.99 annually</p> \n<p><strong>Available for:</strong>&nbsp;Windows, Mac, or app version for iOS or Android</p> \n<h3>2.<a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">Premiere Pro</a></h3> \n<p>Premiere Pro is one of the highest-quality video editor tools you'll find. Used by Hollywood filmmakers, TV editors, and YouTubers, the software offers all the creative features you need to craft polished videos. Premiere Pro provides features for color grading, data visualization, and audio tools to remove background noise. Additionally, Premiere Pro now comes with Premiere Rush CC, which is an app you can use to edit footage on your phone, then share directly to your social networks, including YouTube.</p> \n<p>Leticia De Bortoli, a HubSpot Senior Video Editor, shares what takes her videos to the next level. She uses Premiere when editing her team's videos, as well as Audition for sound, and DaVinci for color correction. Bortoli cites this software, great lighting, and audio tools as the secrets to her sharp videos.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"Premiere Pro video editing software on PC and mobile\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-Mar-12-2021-06-08-24-08-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-Mar-12-2021-06-08-24-08-PM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image</a><a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\" style=\"font-style: italic;\"> Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;As a standalone app, Premiere Pro is $239.88 per year</p> \n<p><strong>Available for: </strong>Mac, Windows</p> \n<h3>3.<a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.videostudiopro.com/en/\">VideoStudio</a></h3> \n<p>VideoStudio is an excellent video editing software that is intuitive even for the beginner editor. This software has all the standard features to storyboard and sound editing for footage up to 4K. Users can benefit from VideoStudio as it has individual auto movie creator features like Highlight Reel creator to assist in simplifying the editing process. Starting your YouTube channel with the help of VideoStudio would be a smart way to build your content.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"VideoStudio video editing software displaying shot of woman and audio layering\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-Mar-12-2021-06-08-24-78-PM.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-Mar-12-2021-06-08-24-78-PM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.videostudiopro.com/en/products/videostudio/pro/\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;One time payment of $59.99 to $79.99 depending on package</p> \n<p><strong>Available for: </strong>Mac,<strong>&nbsp;</strong>Windows</p> \n<h3>4.<a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.pinnaclesys.com/\">Pinnacle Studio 24</a></h3> \n<p>Pinnacle Studio 24 is an editing software that is made for video enthusiasts looking to build unique and eye catching content. Not only does this software offer high end features like fast rendering performance, motion tracking, and color correction, but it can support 360 camera and VR footage in its Studio Ultimate package. Pinnacle’s range of effects goes beyond previously mentioned softwares by letting users create frame by frame edits for enhanced masking or warping of footage for astonishing visual effects. Dynamic features aside, it can also simplify screen recording or multi-camera editing perfect for a variety of YouTube series formats.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Pinnacle Studio 24 video editing software showing 360 camera landscape footage\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://fixthephoto.com/pinnacle-studio-23-ultimate-review.html\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;One time payment of $59.95 to $129.95 depending on package</p> \n<p><strong>Available for:</strong>&nbsp;Windows</p> \n<h3>5.<a href=\"https://www.adobe.com/products/premiere.html\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.cyberlink.com/products/powerdirector-video-editing-software/features_en_US.html?r=1\">CyberLink PowerDirector 365</a></h3> \n<p>Users who subscribe to PowerDirector can enjoy video and audio software with new effects, music-samples and general improvements added monthly. The difference between this software and others is that this editing software offers you features similar to Photoshop, for your recordings. You can enjoy creating vector shape designs in the same interface used for desirable YouTube titles and transitions in the same interface as where you edit frames of footage. While there is a learning curve with CyberLink PowerDirector, the possibilities are endless when you begin.</p> \n<p>Additionally, David Guerrera, a HubSpot Senior Video Creator and Animator, mentioned the YouTube channel<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/user/filmriot\">&nbsp;</a><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/user/filmriot\">Film Riot</a>&nbsp;for further inspiration when making unique videos with powerful software. \"Film Riot is a great resource for filmmakers of all skill levels who are looking to learn new techniques to use on their next low budget or big budget video project.\"</p> \n<p><img alt=\"CyberLink PowerDirector video editing software adjusting display settings\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-4.png?width=624&amp;name=10%20Best%20Video%20Software%20Tools%20for%20Youtube-4.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\"></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 13px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iQkxj7Xh2t8\" style=\"font-style: italic;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p><strong>Price:</strong>&nbsp;$19.99 monthly and $69.99 annually</p> \n<p><strong>Available for:</strong>&nbsp;Mac, Windows</p> \n<p>Ultimately, you'll need to choose a software that works for your team and your budget, but creating high-quality YouTube videos doesn't have to break the bank. In fact, you can find plenty of tools that are either free or fall under $100.</p> \n<p>The hardest part about starting a YouTube channel is, starting. There’s a lot of competition on the platform, but there are ways to break through the noise. Building a channel with videos featuring smooth video editing, high-resolution picture and clear audio recording&nbsp;will set the standard for your channel’s success.</p> \n<p><strong><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=7e8681b3-9162-45a4-b6a1-f33ff244a78a&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; 12:49:30","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:30","title":"17 Truly Inspiring Company Vision and Mission Statement Examples","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/inspiring-company-mission-statements","description":"<p>Think about those brands you purchase from over and over, even when there are cheaper options out there. Why do you choose the ones you choose?</p> \n<p>Do you usually fly on a particular airline? Do you buy your coffee from the same place every morning? Do you recommend a specific restaurant whenever out-of-towners ask for suggestions? Well, there's a good reason for it.</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=72c7ece3-b9c6-4064-8a2a-33f42783a2d5&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; \" alt=\"→ Free Resource: 100 Mission Statement Templates &amp; Examples\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/72c7ece3-b9c6-4064-8a2a-33f42783a2d5.png\"></a></p> \n<p></p> \n<p>The reason we stay loyal to brands is because of their values. The best brands strive to combine physical, emotional, and logical elements into one exceptional customer (and employee) experience that you value as much as they do. Nowhere are those values more visible than in the company's mission statement.</p> \n<p>When you successfully create a connection with your customers and employees, many of them might stay loyal to you for life. This helps you increase your overall profitability while building a solid foundation of brand promoters.</p> \n<p>But achieving that connection is no easy task. The companies that succeed are ones that stay true to their core values over the years and create a company that employees and customers are proud to associate with.</p> \n<p>That's where company vision and mission statements come in.</p> \n<p>&nbsp;</p> \n<h2>What is a Vision Statement?</h2> \n<p>A vision statement describes where the company aspires to be upon achieving its mission. This statement reveals the \"where\" of a business. Below are some vision statements from well-known companies to give you a sense of how a vision represents a brand.</p> \n<h3>Vision Statement Examples</h3> \n<ul> \n <li style=\"text-align: left;\"><a href=\"https://www.alz.org/about/strategic-plan\">Alzheimer's Association</a>: A world without Alzheimer's disease.</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://www.teachforamerica.org/what-we-do/who-we-are\">Teach for America</a>: One day, all children in this nation will have the opportunity to attain an excellent education.</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://creativecommons.org/about/mission-and-vision/\">Creative Commons</a>: Realizing the full potential of the internet -- universal access to research and education, full participation in culture -- to drive a new era of development, growth, and productivity.</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://money.cnn.com/2015/04/05/technology/bill-gates-email-microsoft-40-anniversary/index.html\">Microsoft</a> (at its founding): A computer on every desk and in every home.</li> \n <li><a href=\"http://www.health.gov.au/internet/main/publishing.nsf/Content/annual-report-1415-toc~14-15-our-vision\">Australia Department of Health</a>: Better health and wellbeing for all Australians, now and for future generations.</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://about.linkedin.com/\">LinkedIn</a>: Create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce.&nbsp;</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://www.thewaltdisneycompany.com/about/\">Disney</a>: T<span>o entertain, inform and inspire people around the globe through the power of unparalleled storytelling, reflecting the iconic brands, creative minds and innovative technologies that make ours the world’s premier entertainment company.</span></li> \n <li><span><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/\">Facebook</a>: </span>Connect with friends and the world around you on Facebook.</li> \n</ul> \n<h2 style=\"text-align: left;\">What is a Mission Statement?</h2> \n<p>If the above examples are vision statements, what's a mission statement? A mission statement is, in some ways, an action-oriented vision statement, declaring the purpose an organization serves to its audience. It often includes a general description of the organization, its function, and its objectives.</p> \n<p>As a company grows, its objectives and goals may be reached, and in turn they'll change. Therefore, mission and vision statements should be revised as needed to reflect the business's new culture as previous goals are met.</p> \n<p>Both mission and vision statements are often combined into one comprehensive \"mission statement\" to define the organization's reason for existing and its outlook for internal and external audiences -- like employees, partners, board members, consumers, and shareholders.</p> \n<p>With that in mind, what does a good mission statement look like? Check out some of the following company mission statements for yourself -- and get inspired to write one for your brand.</p> \n<div class=\"hsg-featured-snippet\"> \n <h2>Mission Statement Examples</h2> \n <ol> \n  <li>Life is Good: To spread the power of optimism.</li> \n  <li>sweetgreen: To inspire healthier communities by connecting people to real food.</li> \n  <li>Patagonia: Build the best product, cause no unnecessary harm, use business to inspire and implement solutions to the environmental crisis.</li> \n  <li>American Express: We work hard every day to make American Express the world's most respected service brand.</li> \n  <li>Warby Parker: To offer designer eyewear at a revolutionary price, while leading the way for socially conscious businesses.</li> \n  <li>InvisionApp: Question Assumptions. Think Deeply. Iterate as a Lifestyle. Details, Details. Design is Everywhere. Integrity.</li> \n  <li>Honest Tea: To create and promote great-tasting, healthy, organic beverages.</li> \n  <li>IKEA: To create a better everyday life for the many people.</li> \n  <li>Nordstrom: To give customers the most compelling shopping experience possible.</li> \n  <li>Cradles to Crayons: Provides children from birth through age 12, living in homeless or low-income situations, with the essential items they need to thrive – at home, at school and at play.</li> \n  <li>Universal Health Services, Inc.: To provide superior quality healthcare services that: PATIENTS recommend to family and friends, PHYSICIANS prefer for their patients, PURCHASERS select for their clients, EMPLOYEES are proud of, and INVESTORS seek for long-term returns.</li> \n  <li>JetBlue: To inspire humanity – both in the air and on the ground.</li> \n  <li>Workday: To put people at the center of enterprise software.</li> \n  <li>Prezi: To reinvent how people share knowledge, tell stories, and inspire their audiences to act.</li> \n  <li>Tesla: To accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy.</li> \n  <li>Invisible Children: To end violence and exploitation facing our world's most isolated and vulnerable communities.</li> \n  <li>TED: Spread ideas.</li> \n </ol> \n</div> \n<h2>Best Vision and Mission Statement Examples From Real Companies</h2> \n<h3>1. Life Is Good: To spread the power of optimism.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.38.06%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.38.06%20PM.png\" alt=\"Life Is Good vision and mission statement &quot;to spread the power of optimism&quot;\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\" width=\"600\" title=\"life is good mission\"></p> \n<p>The Life is Good brand is about more than spreading optimism -- although, with uplifting T-shirt slogans like \"Seas The Day\" and \"Forecast: Mostly Sunny,\" it's hard not to crack a smile.</p> \n<p>There are a ton of T-shirt companies in the world, but Life is Good's mission sets itself apart with a <a href=\"http://content.lifeisgood.com/purpose/\">mission statement</a> goes beyond fun clothing: to spread the power of optimism. This mission is perhaps a little unexpected if you're not familiar with the company's public charity: How will a T-shirt company help spread optimism? Life is Good answers that question below the fold, where what the mission means is explained in more detail, with links to programs implemented to support it: <a href=\"http://content.lifeisgood.com/community/\">its #GrowTheGood initiative</a> and the <a href=\"http://content.lifeisgood.com/playmakers/\">Life is Good Kids Foundation page</a>. We really like how lofty yet specific this mission statement is -- it's a hard-to-balance combination.</p> \n<h3>2. sweetgreen: To inspire healthier communities by connecting people to real food.</h3>  \n<div class=\"hs-responsive-embed-wrapper hs-responsive-embed\" style=\"width: 100%; height: auto; position: relative; overflow: hidden; padding: 0; min-width: 256px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin: 0px auto;\"> \n <div class=\"hs-responsive-embed-inner-wrapper\" style=\"position: relative; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; padding-bottom: 56.07%; margin: 0;\">\n  <iframe class=\"hs-responsive-embed-iframe hs-fullwidth-embed\" style=\"position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border: none;\" src=\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/o2MNNPX_x1I\" width=\"560\" height=\"314\" allowfullscreen></iframe>\n </div> \n</div>  \n<p>Notice that sweetgreen's mission is positioned to align with <em>your </em>values -- not just written as something the brand believes. We love the inclusive language used in its statement, letting us know that the company is all about connecting its <a href=\"http://sweetgreen.com/our-story/\">growing network</a> of farmers growing healthy, local ingredients with us -- the customer -- because we're the ones who want more locally grown, healthy food options.</p> \n<p>The mission to <em>connect people </em>is what makes this statement so strong. And that promise has gone beyond sweetgreen's website and walls of its food shops: The team has made strides in the communities where it's opened stores as well. Primarily, it provides education to young kids on healthy eating, fitness, sustainability, and where food comes from. The <a href=\"http://sweetlifefestival.com/\">sweetlife music festival</a> attracts 20,000 like-minded people every year who come together to listen to music, eat healthy food, and give back to a cause -- the sweetgreen in schools charity partner, FoodCorps.</p> \n<h3>3. Patagonia: Build the best product, cause no unnecessary harm, use business to inspire and implement solutions to the environmental crisis.</h3> \n<p><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" style=\"width: 669px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.46.06%20PM.png?width=669&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.46.06%20PM.png\" alt=\"Patagonia vision and mission statement\" width=\"669\" title=\"Patagonia mission\"></p> \n<p>Patagonia's mission statement combines both the values that bring them market success (building safe, high-quality products) <em>and </em>the values that contribute to a better world (philanthropic efforts to help the environment). <a href=\"http://www.patagonia.com/us/patagonia.go?assetid=2047\">For the people behind the brand</a>, \"a love of wild and beautiful places demands participation in the fight to save them.\" In the name of this cause, the company donates time, services, and at least 1% of its sales to hundreds of grassroots environmental groups around the world.</p> \n<p>If your company has a similar focus on growing your business <em>and</em> giving back, think about talking about both the benefit you bring to customers and the value you want to bring to a greater cause in your mission statement.</p> \n<h3>4. American Express: We work hard every day to make American Express the world's most respected service brand.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/american-express-vision-mission-statement.png?width=600&amp;name=american-express-vision-mission-statement.png\" alt=\"American Express vision and mission statement\" width=\"600\" style=\"width: 600px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p>  \n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\"> \n <p>Customers will never love a company until the employees love it first.</p> — Simon Sinek (@simonsinek) \n <a href=\"https://twitter.com/simonsinek/status/456545886143643649\">April 16, 2014</a>\n</blockquote> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">  </h4>  \n<p>The tweet above is<a href=\"https://twitter.com/simonsinek/status/456545886143643649\"> from Simon Sinek</a>, and it's one that we repeat here at HubSpot all the time. American Express sets itself apart from other credit card companies <a href=\"http://about.americanexpress.com/oc/whoweare/\">in its list of values</a>, with an ode to great customer service, which is something it’s famous for.</p> \n<p><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.50.22%20PM.png?width=373&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.50.22%20PM.png\" alt=\"American Express values\" width=\"373\" style=\"width: 373px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" title=\"American Express Values\"></p> \n<p>We especially love the emphasis on teamwork and supporting employees, so that the people inside of the organization can be in the best position to support their customers.</p> \n<h3>5. Warby Parker: To offer designer eyewear at a revolutionary price, while leading the way for socially conscious businesses.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.54.54%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.54.54%20PM.png\" alt=\"Warby Parker objective\" width=\"600\" title=\"Warby Parker objective\"></p> \n<p>Speaking of quirky, this \"objective\" statement from <a href=\"https://www.warbyparker.com/history\">Warby Parker </a>uses words that reflect a young and daring personality: \"rebellious,\" \"revolutionary,\" \"socially-conscious.\" In one sentence, the brand takes us back to the root of why it was founded while also revealing its vision for a better future.</p> \n<p>The longer-form version of the mission reads: \"We believe that buying glasses should be easy and fun. It should leave you happy and good-looking, with money in your pocket,\" which further shows how Warby Parker doesn't hold back on letting its unique personality shine through. Here, the missions statement's success all comes down to spot-on word choice.</p> \n<h3>6. InvisionApp: Question Assumptions. Think Deeply. Iterate as a Lifestyle. Details, Details. Design is Everywhere. Integrity.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.59.57%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%202.59.57%20PM.png\" alt=\"InVision Values\" width=\"600\" title=\"InVision Values\"></p> \n<p>These days, it can seem like every B2B company page looks the same -- but InvisionApp has one of the cooler <a href=\"http://www.invisionapp.com/company\">company pages</a> I've seen. Scroll down to \"Our Core Values,\" and hover your mouse over any of the icons, and you'll find a short-but-sweet piece of the overall company mission under each icon. We love the way the statements are laid out under each icon. Each description is brief, authentic, and business babble-free -- which makes the folks at InvisionApp seem like trustworthy, B.S.-free types.</p> \n<h3>7. Honest Tea: To create and promote great-tasting, healthy, organic beverages.</h3> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.03.00%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.03.00%20PM.png\" width=\"600\" alt=\"Honest Tea vision and mission statement\" title=\"honest tea mission\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\"></h4> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Honest Tea's mission statement begins with a simple punch line connoting its tea is <em>real, pure, </em>and therefore not full of artificial chemicals. The brand is speaking to an audience that's tired of finding ingredients in its tea that can't be pronounced, and have been searching for a tea that's exactly what it says it is.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Not only does Honest Tea have a punny name, but it also centers its mission around the clever company name. For some time, the company even <a href=\"https://www.honesttea.com/wp-content/themes/honesttea/assets/pdf/HT_MR_2015_web_FINAL.pdf\">published a Mission Report</a> each year in an effort to be \"transparent about our business practices and live up to our mission to seek to create and promote great-tasting, healthier, organic beverages.\"</p> \n<h3>8. IKEA: To create a better everyday life for the many people.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.06.23%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.06.23%20PM.png\" alt=\"IKEA vision and mission statement\" width=\"600\" title=\"IKEA vision\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">The folks at IKEA dream big. The vision-based mission statement could have been one of beautiful, affordable furniture, but instead, it's to make <em>everyday life better</em> for its customers. It's a partnership: IKEA finds deals all over the world and buys in bulk, then we choose the furniture and pick it up at a self-service warehouse.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">\"Our business idea supports this vision ... so [that] as many people as possible will be able to afford them,\" <a href=\"http://www.ikea.com/ms/en_SG/about_ikea/our_business_idea/index.html\">the brand states</a>.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Using words like \"as many people as possible\" makes a huge company like IKEA much more accessible and appealing to customers.</p> \n<h3>9. Nordstrom: \"To give customers the most compelling shopping experience possible.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.25.48%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.25.48%20PM.png\" width=\"600\" alt=\"Nordstrom history, vision and mission statement\" title=\"Nordstrom history\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">When it comes to customer commitment, not many companies are as hyper-focused as Nordstrom is. Although clothing selection, quality, and value all have a place in <a href=\"http://shop.nordstrom.com/c/company-history\">the company's mission statement</a>, it’s crystal clear that it’s all about the customer: \"Nordstrom works relentlessly to give customers the most compelling shopping experience possible.\"</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">If you've ever shopped at a Nordstrom, you'll know the brand will uphold the high standard for customer service mentioned in its mission statement, as associates are always roaming the sales floors, asking customers whether they've been helped, and doing everything they can to make the shopping experience a memorable one.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">10. Cradles to Crayons: Provides children from birth through age 12, living in homeless or low-income situations, with the essential items they need to thrive – at home, at school and at play.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.37.48%20PM.png?width=600&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202017-07-11%20at%203.37.48%20PM.png\" width=\"600\" alt=\"cradles to crayons vision and mission statement\" title=\"cradles to crayons mission\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Cradles to Crayons divided its mission and model into three sections that read like a game plan: The Need, The Mission, and The Model. The \"rule of three\" is a powerful rhetorical device called a tricolon that's usually used in speechwriting to help make an idea more memorable. A tricolon is a series of three parallel elements of roughly the same length -- think \"I came; I saw; I conquered.\"</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">11. Universal Health Services, Inc.: To provide superior quality healthcare services that: PATIENTS recommend to family and friends, PHYSICIANS prefer for their patients, PURCHASERS select for their clients, EMPLOYEES are proud of, and INVESTORS seek for long-term returns.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/universal-health-services-mission-statement.png?width=600&amp;name=universal-health-services-mission-statement.png\" width=\"600\" alt=\"Universal Health Services vision and mission statement\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">A company thrives when it pleases its customers, its employees, its partners, and its investors -- and Universal Health Services endeavors to do just that, according to <a href=\"http://www.uhsinc.com/about-us/mission-statement/\">its mission statement</a>. As a health care service, it specifically strives to please its patients, physicians, purchasers, employees, and investors. We love the emphasis on each facet of the organization, by capitalizing the font and making it red for easy skimming.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">12. JetBlue: To inspire humanity – both in the air and on the ground.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"alignCenter shadow\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Jb-for-good-3.jpg?width=600&amp;name=Jb-for-good-3.jpg\" width=\"600\" alt=\"JetBlue vision and mission statement\" title=\"Jb-for-good-3.jpg\" style=\"width: 600px; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">JetBlue's committed to <a href=\"https://www.jetblue.com/corporate-social-responsibility/\">its founding mission</a> through lovable marketing, charitable partnerships, and influential programs -- and we love the approachable language used to describe these endeavors. For example, the brand writes how it \"set out in 2000 to bring humanity back to the skies.\"</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">For those of us who want to learn more about any of its specific efforts, JetBlue's provided details on the Soar With Reading program, its partnership with KaBOOM!, the JetBlue Foundation, environmental and social reporting, and so on. It breaks down all these initiatives really well with big headers, bullet points, pictures, and links to other webpages visitors can click to learn more. Finally, it ends with a call-to-action encouraging website visitors volunteer or donate their TrueBlue points.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">13. Workday: To put people at the center of enterprise software.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/workday-mission-statement.png?width=600&amp;name=workday-mission-statement.png\" alt=\"Workday vision and mission statement\" width=\"600\" style=\"width: 600px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Workday, a human resources (HR) task automation service, doesn't use its mission statement to highlight the features of its product or how it intends to help HR professionals improve in such-and-such a way.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Instead, the business takes a stance on the state of enterprise software in general: There's a lot of great tech out there. But at <a href=\"https://www.workday.com/\">Workday</a>, it revolves around the people. We love how confident yet kind this mission statement is. It observes the state of its industry -- which Workday believes lacks a human touch -- and builds company values around it.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">14. Prezi: To reinvent how people share knowledge, tell stories, and inspire their audiences to act.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/prezi-vision-mission-statement.png?width=450&amp;name=prezi-vision-mission-statement.png\" alt=\"Prezi vision and mission statement\" width=\"450\" style=\"width: 450px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">If you know Prezi, you know how engaging it can make your next business presentation look. According to its mission statement, the company's clever slide animations and 3-dimensional experience aren't just superficial product features. With every decision <a href=\"https://prezi.com/about/\">Prezi</a> makes, it's all about the story you tell and the audience that story affects.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">15. Tesla: To accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/tesla-mission-statement.png?width=600&amp;name=tesla-mission-statement.png\" alt=\"Tesla vision and mission statement\" width=\"600\" style=\"width: 600px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">A car company's punny use of the word \"accelerate\" is just one reason this mission statement sticks out. The main reason <a href=\"https://www.tesla.com/about\">Tesla</a> makes this list is because of how its mission statement describes the industry.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">It may be a car company, but Tesla's main interest isn't just automobile sales -- it's promoting sustainable energy. And sustainable energy still has a \"long road\" ahead of it (pun intended) -- hence the world's \"transition\" into this market.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ultimately, a mission statement that can admit to the industry's immaturity is exactly what gets customers to root for it. And Tesla does that nicely.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">16. Invisible Children: To end violence and exploitation facing our world's most isolated and vulnerable communities.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/invisible-children-mission-statement.png?width=600&amp;name=invisible-children-mission-statement.png\" alt=\"Invisible Children vision and mission statement\" width=\"600\" style=\"width: 600px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Tenacity is hard to come by in the non-profit sector, and that's what makes this mission statement so distinguished. <a href=\"https://invisiblechildren.com/challenge/\">Invisible Children</a> is a non-profit that raises awareness around the violence affecting communities across Central Africa, and the company takes quite a confident tone in its mission.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">The most valuable quality of this mission statement is that it has an end goal. Many companies' visions and missions are intentionally left open-ended so that the business might always be needed by the community. Invisible Children, on the other hand, wants to \"end\" the violence facing African families. It's an admirable mission that all businesses -- not just non-profits -- can learn from when trying to motivate their customers.</p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: left;\">17. TED: Spread ideas.</h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ted-mission-statement.png?width=600&amp;name=ted-mission-statement.png\" alt=\"TED vision and mission statement: Spread ideas\" width=\"600\" style=\"width: 600px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">We've all seen TED Talks online before. Well, the company happens to have one of the most succinct mission statements out there.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">TED, which stands for \"Technology Education and Design,\" has a two-word mission statement that shines through in every Talk you've seen the company publish on the internet. That mission statement: \"Spread ideas.\" Sometimes, the best way to get an audience to remember you is to zoom out as far as your business's vision can go. What do you really care about? <a href=\"https://www.ted.com/about/our-organization\">TED</a> has recorded some of the most famous presentations in the world, but in the grand scheme of things, all it wants is to spread ideas around to its viewers.</p> \n<p><i>Here are 22 <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/brand-slogans-and-taglines\">companies with really catchy slogans and brand taglines</a>.</i></p> \n<p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in August 2014 and has been updated for comprehensiveness.</em></p> \n<p><em><em><em><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=9dbb6b2a-959e-401f-b57b-e77d3b99e9c8&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; \" alt=\"New Call-to-action\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/9dbb6b2a-959e-401f-b57b-e77d3b99e9c8.png\"></a></em></em></em></p> \n<div>\n <a class=\"close\"> </a>\n <a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=7d6729c4-6dba-43ab-98a4-742fe7f417d4&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; \" alt=\"New Call-to-action\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/7d6729c4-6dba-43ab-98a4-742fe7f417d4.png\"></a>\n</div>  \n<img src=\"https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&amp;k=14&amp;r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Finspiring-company-mission-statements&amp;bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&amp;bvt=rss\"
